summary: A configuration container that holds all hyperparameters needed to define the architecture of a multilingual transformer model capable of text-to-text, speech-to-speech, and text-to-speech processing. It specifies vocabulary sizes, hidden dimensions, layer counts, attention heads, dropout rates, position‑embedding types, adapter options, and vocoder parameters for the various sub‑modules (text encoder/decoder, speech encoder, text‑to‑unit model, and HiFi‑GAN vocoder).
business_intent: Allow developers to customize and instantiate SeamlessM4T models with precise architectural settings for multilingual speech and text generation applications.
